𒀉 ≈ 𒁕 𒐑 ≈ 𒐀⋅𒐺𒎗𒁹 ≈ 𒐺𒎗𒐈 ≠ 𒄭𒁹 𒋼 𒂅 …
𒀉 ≈ 𒁕 𒊺 ŠE
𒀉 Letter Á AR Arm AM 'M 𒀀 𒄷 aḫu, áhi meaning: arm 𓂝 < brachiom
𒀉 AR in 𒀉𒌉 𒀉𒊩 arhuš
𒀉 ARᵐ 𓂝 𒀉𒎌 arms "weapons"

𒀉 ᵇIT / ᵐIT

𒀉 a₂ 𓂢 Elle in 𒀉𒇻𒅆 a₂.lu.lim alulim Ἄλωρος 'stag'

𒀉 ᵇIT "Pfote"
𒀉 ᵇIT "beat"
𒀉 ʷIT 𒀉𒋾 ʷit-ti ʷitti with 2. 𒀉𒋾 •synt > 𓎛 𓈖 𓂝
𒀉 IT 𒁕 idû 𒂆 ᶥṭa 𓂞 𓂧 •ilt hold halt Elle™
𒀉 IT 𒁕 idû yad 𓂞 > 𐩺𐩵 yd 𐎊𐎄 yd
𒀉 IT 𒁕 idi in-di ante at ad to "before" 𒀀𒁲 aⁿdi ante ≈ 𒃼 Hante
𒀉 IT 𒀉𒀾 #īttu 𓏏𓇋𓏏𓂅 "signs" 𒐑𒁕𒀾 a₂aš₂ (sic)

𒀉 IT in 𒀉𒊺 itše itso jetzt এতিয়া etia ܐܵܕܝܼܵܐ ādīyā այժմ ayžm "now" ⇔ અધુના adhunā nunc now 𐌽𐌿 nu

𒂆 AGA₃ Axt ax
𒂇 AGA axe ascia āšĝar 𒍏𒀉𒀸𒃻
𒀉 axe ≈ 𒀉𒄞 ox

𒀉 = 𒁕 𒐑 da.sh 𐀈-𐀰 do-so doso ≈ 𓂞 ⇔ dosis
𒀉 = 𒐑 𒁕 sh.da in 𒀉𒉣𒅅 •šta₂nun-ĝal₂ strong 𒀉𒉣𒄄𒀀 •šta₂nun-gi-a strength

𒀉 𒆗 usu ᶠusu force, strength, Stärke
𒀉𒆗𒌇 usu-tuku u'suturku stark strong

𓂞 𒁕⇔ idû 又 YAD 𒄿𒁺 i-du yet 𓂝+𓋴 Ɣat <?> 𒋗 qātu Hand:Kante <?> 𒂆 > Γ Gamma ?
𓂡 𒀉 ⇔ 𓋴 𓂝 ⋍ 𒁕+𒊺 ŠE 𐀮 se ⇔ 手 shǒu 𒋗 šu hand 𒅆 ši 𒄿𒁺

𓂡 𒀉 𒄿𒁺 ˢi-du side shoulder, arm

𒀉𒈭 it-tah “aid” עדר adar 𓂝 𓏤 𓂞 𓂋 ⇔ 𓂋 𓂞 𓂝 𓏤 𓈖 | give a hand (to) | ἀρωγή arōgḗ (ν)

very strong Aᵐ M complement dialectic

𒀉𒄣𒊒 •šōb-qu-ru ⋍ Schöpfkelle “spoon” < ϣⲱⲃ šōbᵒⁿ
𒀉𒄣𒊒 ᵐ-qu-ru ⇔ مغرفة mḡarfa “spoon” чӏакъв č'aq'w

𒀉𒁀𒊒 •šōb-ba-ru 𓋴 𓁒 𓀀 ϣⲫⲏⲣ “friend” < ϣⲱⲃ šōb “arm” 𒀉
𒀉𒁀𒊒 ᵐit-ba-ru 𓅓 𓋴 𓁒 𓀀 “friend” ⲙⲉⲧϣⲫⲏⲣ 𓄟(𓁒 𒁀𒊒 birth)

The M component of arm (𒀉) is supported by its synonym 𒂊𒈬𒄣 emū (sic)
The M component of arm (𒀉) is supported by Akkadian 𒄠𒈠𒌅 #ammatu 𒀉𒁹𒋢 (a2-diš-kuš3) "forearm cubit"
The M component of arm (𒀉) is supported by Akkadian #manahtu 𒀉𒊨 a2-kuš2 "toil, labor" ⇔ manu
The M component of arm (𒀀𒄷) is supported by 𒄷 MUŠEN and Humbaba 𒄷𒉿𒉿 ⋍ 𒄷𒌝𒁀𒁀

alternative span ˢᵖ𓂝 ϣⲫⲏⲣ 𓋴 𓁒 𓀀 (sign confusion?)

𒀉𒁺 ˢᵖed-du spitz 𓋴 𓊪 𓂧 𓏏 𓇮
𒀉𒁺 pointed
⇔
𒀉𒌅 ˢᵖit-tu spider “eight-legged” < spander spinder spinne𓄛
𒀉𒌅 ˢᵖit-tu spider ⇔ ሳሬት saret սարդ sard

𒀉𒄣𒊒 ˢᵖit-qu-ru
𒀉𒄣𒊒 spoon ⇔ σφήν sphḗn “wedge” स्फ्य sphya, “oar; spar”

𒀉𒇻 ˢᵖeṭ-lu sportler, Sporn
𒀉𒇻 young man

𒂆 ṭa ⇔ ˢit 𒀉𒋾𒄿 = sit

𒀉 arms 𐌰𐍂𐌼𐍃 A.R.M.S

The R component of arm is corroborated by 𒀉𒁍𒁕 a2-gid2-da #ariktu "spear"

The S component in 𓂡 (𓂝+𓋴) and 𒀉 (𒁕+𒊺Š) could be explained via 𐌰𐍂𐌼𐍃 AMS= arm (todo)

𓂝 brachio > force, power
𓂞 derechia > direction 𐎏𐎗𐎋𐎚 drkt "rule, power" decret
𓃀 di:walk direction alaktu act in-di ante
𓃀 pota > potenza potis ⋍ 𓄇 panther paw power 𐀤𐀊
𓂝 ARAḪX 𒍑𒁍𒁕 (⇔ 𒀴 ÌR ARAD servant)
𓂝 uru 𒌷 = 𒍑 ardu >
